languages.text: "Они вели себя просто ужасно! Били по голове и ребрам тех, кто даже не сопротивлялся. Немезита на них нет!.."

traits.locale_text: "Они вели себя просто ужасно! Били по голове и ребрам тех, кто даже не сопротивлялся. Немезита на них нет!.."

languages.text: "They were acting horribly! They were hitting people in the head and the ribs, they didn't care if someone fought back or not. Nemesite would never allow that!"
languages.original_text: "Они вели себя просто ужасно! Били по голове и ребрам тех, кто даже не сопротивлялся. Немезита на них нет!.."

traits.locale_text: "They were acting horribly! They hit people who did not even fight back in the head and the ribs. Nemesite would never allow that!"
"They were acting horribly! They hit people who did not even fight back in the head and the ribs. Nemesite would never allow that!"
"They were acting horribly! They were hitting people who did not even fight back in the head and the ribs. Nemesite would never allow that!"
"They were acting horribly! They were hitting people who did not even fight back in the head and the ribs. Nemesite would never allow that!"
"They were acting horribly! They were hitting people in the head and the ribs, they didn't care if someone fought back or not. Nemesite would never allow that!"
"They were acting horribly! They were hitting people in the head and the ribs, they didn't care if someone fought back or not. Nemesite would never allow that!"

languages.text: "Sie haben sich ganz grauenhaft verhalten! Sie haben Leute auf den Kopf und in die Rippen geschlagen, und es war ihnen egal, wenn sich jemand gewehrt hat. Nemesit würde das niemals gestatten!"
languages.original_text: "They were acting horribly! They were hitting people in the head and the ribs, they didn't care if someone fought back or not. Nemesite would never allow that!"

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben sich ganz grauenhaft verhalten! Sie haben Leute auf den Kopf und in die Rippen geschlagen, und es war ihnen egal, wenn sich jemand gewehrt hat. Nemesit würde das niemals gestatten!"

languages.text: «¡Qué forma más horrible de comportarse! Golpeaban a la gente en la cabeza y las costillas, sin importarles si se defendían o no. ¡Nemesitio nunca lo permitiría!».
languages.original_text: "They were acting horribly! They were hitting people in the head and the ribs, they didn't care if someone fought back or not. Nemesite would never allow that!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué forma más horrible de comportarse! Golpeaban a la gente en la cabeza y las costillas, sin importarles si se defendían o no. ¡Nemesitio nunca lo permitiría!».

languages.text: 「奴らは酷い態度だったよ！みんなの頭やあばらを殴って、反撃しようがしまいがお構いなしだったんだ。ネメサイトはそんなこと、絶対に許さないよ！」
languages.original_text: "They were acting horribly! They were hitting people in the head and the ribs, they didn't care if someone fought back or not. Nemesite would never allow that!"

traits.locale_text: 「奴らは酷い態度だったよ！みんなの頭やあばらを殴って、反撃しようがしまいがお構いなしだったんだ。ネメサイトはそんなこと、絶対に許さないよ！」

languages.text: “那些人简直是畜生！他们打破别人的头，打断他们的肋骨！哪怕对方没有还手，他们也毫不留情！涅墨斯特绝不会容忍这样的事情！”
languages.original_text: "They were acting horribly! They were hitting people in the head and the ribs, they didn't care if someone fought back or not. Nemesite would never allow that!"

traits.locale_text: “那些人简直是畜生！他们打破别人的头，打断他们的肋骨！哪怕对方没有还手，他们也毫不留情！涅墨斯特绝不会容忍这样的事情！”

languages.text: « Ils se sont comportés comme des brutes, à tabasser tout le monde sans distinction, que les gens leur résistent ou non ! Némésite ne permettrait jamais une chose pareille ! »
languages.original_text: "They were acting horribly! They were hitting people in the head and the ribs, they didn't care if someone fought back or not. Nemesite would never allow that!"

traits.locale_text: « Ils se sont comportés comme des brutes, à tabasser tout le monde sans distinction, que les gens leur résistent ou non ! Némésite ne permettrait jamais une chose pareille ! »

languages.text: "Herkese korkunç davrandılar! İnsanların kafalarına ve kaburgalarına vuruyorlardı. Birisi karşı çıkar mı çıkmaz mı hiç umurlarında değildi. Nemezit buna asla göz yummazdı!"
languages.original_text: "They were acting horribly! They were hitting people in the head and the ribs, they didn't care if someone fought back or not. Nemesite would never allow that!"
